TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlTable extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl

summary.span: 允许在服务器上对 HTML 元素进行编程访问。

span.span: Allows programmatic access on the server to the HTML element.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用控制以编程方式控制 HTML``服务器上的元素。Use the control to programmatically control the HTML `
` element on the server.这可以在网页上创建一个表。This allows you to create a table on a Web page.你可以动态更改的外观`
`元素通过设置， ， ， ，和属性。You can dynamically change the appearance of the `
` element by setting the , , , , and properties. 你还可以控制如何通过设置显示的单元格的内容， ，和属性。You can also control how the content of a cell is displayed by setting the , , and properties. 行都存储在控件的控件属性。The rows of the control are stored in the property of the control. 这允许你以编程方式访问表的各个行。This allows you to programmatically access the individual rows of the table. > [!NOTE] > 不支持复杂的表格模型。A complex table model is not supported. 不能具有控件具有嵌套``， ``， ``， ``，或``元素。You cannot have an control with nested ``, ``, ``, ``, or `` elements.这些元素删除而不发出警告，并不会出现在输出 HTML。These elements are removed without warning and do not appear in the output HTML.如果你尝试以编程方式添加到这些表模型元素，则将引发异常集合控件。An exception will be thrown if you attempt to programmatically add these table model elements to the collection of the control.有关的实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件来显示表中的信息。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control to display information in a table. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableAppearance/CS/htmltablebgcolorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableAppearance/VB/htmltablebgcolorvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何动态创建控件。The following code example demonstrates how to dynamically create an control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTable#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTable/CS/htmltablecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTable#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTable/VB/htmltablevb.aspx#1)]
`， ``, `

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例类。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 下表显示的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||"表"文字字符串。The "table" literal string.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式创建的新实例控件并将它放置在网页上。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically create a new instance of an control and place it on the Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCtor/CS/htmltablectorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCtor/VB/htmltablectorvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Align { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件相对于网页上其他元素的对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the alignment of the control in relation to other elements on the Web page.

value.span: 控件相对于网页上其他元素的对齐方式。

span.span: The alignment of the control in relation to other elements on the Web page.

value.span: 默认值为 ，表示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的对齐方式相对于其他元素在网页上的控件。Use the property to specify the alignment of the control in relation to other elements on the Web page. > [!NOTE] > 此属性不控制中的单元格的内容的对齐方式控件。This property does not control the alignment of the contents in the cells of the control. 若要控制单个单元格的内容的对齐方式，使用和属性类。To control the alignment of contents of an individual cell, use the and properties of the class. 你可以通过使用来控制整个行中单元格的内容的对齐方式和属性类。You can also control the alignment of contents of the cells in an entire row by using the and properties of the class. 下表列出可用于此属性的值。The following table lists the values that can be used for this property. |“值”Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`Left`|对齐网页的左边缘的控件。Aligns the control on the left edge of the Web page.| |`Center`|对齐中间网页的控件。Aligns the control in the middle of the Web page.| |`Right`|对齐Web 页的右边缘上的控件。Aligns the control on the right edge of the Web page.| > [!NOTE] > 如果指定`Left`或`Right`对齐方式，在网页上其他元素将包装到的左右分别控制。If you specify `Left` or `Right` alignment, other elements on the Web page will wrap to the right or left of the control, respectively. 如果指定`Center`对齐方式，会发生不换行和其他元素将出现在控件的下方。If you specify `Center` alignment, no wrapping occurs and other elements appear below the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定的对齐方式相对于其他元素在网页上的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the alignment of the control in relation to other elements on the Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableLayout#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableLayout/CS/htmltablealigncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableLayout#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableLayout/VB/htmltablealignvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ BgColor { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件的背景色。

span.span: Gets or sets the background color of the control.
The background color of the control.

value.span: 默认值为 ，表示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的背景色控件。Use the property to specify the background color of the control. 按名称或使用前面井号字符的十六进制值，则可以指定颜色 （#），在窗体 #RRGGBB 中。You can specify a color either by name or by using a hexadecimal value, preceded by the pound character (#), in the form #RRGGBB. RR、 GG 和 BB 表示从 0 到 255 分别表示一种颜色，红色、 绿色和蓝色组件十六进制值。RR, GG, and BB represent hexadecimal values from 0 to 255 that indicate the red, green, and blue components of a color, respectively. 例如，值 # 0000ff> 表示的颜色为蓝色。For example, the value #0000FF represents the color blue. 它指定对于红色和绿色的组件，而为蓝色组件指定的最大值 (FF) 的最小值 (00)。It specifies the minimum value (00) for the red and green components, while specifying the maximum value (FF) for the blue component. 下表显示了十六个预定义的 HTML 颜色名称和相应的十六进制值，可以用于属性。The following table shows the sixteen predefined HTML color names and corresponding hexadecimal values that can be used for the property. 有关 HTML 颜色的详细信息，请参阅[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 网站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information on HTML colors, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). |颜色名称Color name|十六进制值Hexadecimal value| |----------------|-----------------------| |浅绿色Aqua|#00FFFF#00FFFF| |黑色Black|#000000#000000| |蓝色Blue|#0000FF#0000FF| |紫红色Fuchsia|#FF00FF#FF00FF| |灰色Gray|#808080#808080| |绿色Green|#008000#008000| |为浅Lime|#00FF00#00FF00| |褐紫红色Maroon|#800000#800000| |深蓝色Navy|#000080#000080| |橄榄Olive|#808000#808000| |紫色Purple|#800080#800080| |红色Red|#FF0000#FF0000| |白银Silver|#C0C0C0#C0C0C0| |青色Teal|#008080#008080| |空白White|#FFFFFF#FFFFFF| |黄色Yellow|#FFFF00#FFFF00| 与一起使用的可用颜色属性可以确定从枚举。The available colors for use with the property can be determined from the enumeration. 颜色名称不区分大小写。Color names are case-insensitive. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以编程方式控制的背景色控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically control the background color of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableAppearance/CS/htmltablebgcolorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableAppearance/VB/htmltablebgcolorvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Border { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件的边框宽度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the width (in pixels) of the border of the control.

value.span: 控件的边框宽度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The width (in pixels) of the border of an control.

value.span: 默认值为 -1，指示未设置边框宽度。

span.span: The default is -1, which indicates that the border width is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性以指定边框的宽度。Use the property to specify the width of the border. 如果您不想要显示的边框控件中，将此属性设置为 0 （无边框宽度） 或-1 （未设置边框宽度）。If you do not want to display a border for the control, set this property to either 0 (no border width) or -1 (border width is not set). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以编程方式控制的边框宽度控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically control the border width of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableAppearance/CS/htmltablebgcolorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableAppearance/VB/htmltablebgcolorvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ BorderColor { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件的边框颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the border color of the control.
The border color of the control.

value.span: 默认值为 ，表示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的边框颜色控件。Use the property to specify the border color of the control. 按名称或使用前面井号字符的十六进制值，则可以指定颜色 （#），在窗体 #RRGGBB 中。You can specify a color either by name or by using a hexadecimal value, preceded by the pound character (#), in the form #RRGGBB. RR、 GG 和 BB 表示从 0 到 255 分别表示一种颜色，红色、 绿色和蓝色组件十六进制值。RR, GG, and BB represent hexadecimal values from 0 to 255 that indicate the red, green, and blue components of a color, respectively. 例如，值 # 0000ff> 表示的颜色为蓝色。For example, the value #0000FF represents the color blue. 它指定对于红色和绿色的组件，而为蓝色组件指定的最大值 (FF) 的最小值 (00)。It specifies the minimum value (00) for the red and green components, while specifying the maximum value (FF) for the blue component. 下表显示了十六个预定义的 HTML 颜色名称和相应的十六进制值，可以用于属性。The following table shows the sixteen predefined HTML color names and corresponding hexadecimal values that can be used for the property. 有关 HTML 颜色的详细信息，请参阅[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 网站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information on HTML colors, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). |颜色名称Color name|十六进制值Hexadecimal value| |----------------|-----------------------| |浅绿色Aqua|#00FFFF#00FFFF| |黑色Black|#000000#000000| |蓝色Blue|#0000FF#0000FF| |紫红色Fuchsia|#FF00FF#FF00FF| |灰色Gray|#808080#808080| |绿色Green|#008000#008000| |为浅Lime|#00FF00#00FF00| |褐紫红色Maroon|#800000#800000| |深蓝色Navy|#000080#000080| |橄榄Olive|#808000#808000| |紫色Purple|#800080#800080| |红色Red|#FF0000#FF0000| |白银Silver|#C0C0C0#C0C0C0| |青色Teal|#008080#008080| |空白White|#FFFFFF#FFFFFF| |黄色Yellow|#FFFF00#FFFF00| 与一起使用的可用颜色属性可以确定从枚举。The available colors for use with the property can be determined from the enumeration. 颜色名称不区分大小写。Color names are case-insensitive. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以编程方式控制的边框颜色控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically control the border color of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableAppearance/CS/htmltablebgcolorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableAppearance/VB/htmltablebgcolorvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int CellPadding { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件中单元格内容和单元格边框之间的间距（以像素为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of space (in pixels) between the contents of a cell and the cell's border in the control.

value.span: 控件中单元格内容和单元格边框之间的间距（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The amount of space (in pixels) between the contents of a cell and the cell's border in the control.

value.span: 默认值为 -1，表示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is -1, which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性控制单元格的内容和单元格的边框之间的间距。Use the property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border. 指定的填充量添加到单元格的所有四个边。The padding amount specified is added to all four sides of the cell. 列中的所有单元格都具有相同的单元格宽度;因此，距离将应用于列中最宽的单元格。All cells in a column share the same cell width; therefore, the spacing is applied to the widest cell in the column. 同样，在同一行中的所有单元格共享相同的单元格高度。Similarly, all cells in the same row share the same cell height. 距离将应用于行中最高的单元格。The spacing is applied to the tallest cell in the row. 不能指定单个单元格的大小。Individual cell sizes cannot be specified. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以编程方式控制单元格的内容和中的单元格的边框之间的间距控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically control the spacing between the contents of the cell and the cell's border in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableLayout#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableLayout/CS/htmltablealigncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableLayout#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableLayout/VB/htmltablealignvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int CellSpacing { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件中相邻单元格之间的间距（以像素为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of space (in pixels) between adjacent cells in the control.

value.span: 控件中相邻单元格之间的间距（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The amount of space (in pixels) between adjacent cells in the control.

value.span: 默认值为 -1，表示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is -1, which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来控制各个单元格之间的间距控件。Use the property to control the spacing between individual cells in the control. 在垂直方向和水平应用此间距。This spacing is applied both vertically and horizontally. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以编程方式控制中的单元格的间距控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically control the spacing of cells in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableLayout#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableLayout/CS/htmltablealigncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableLayout#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableLayout/VB/htmltablealignvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 为 控件创建一个新的 对象。

span.span: Creates a new object for the control.

returns.span: 包含 控件的子服务器控件的 。

span.span: A that contains the control's child server controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建用来保存表行的对象。The method creates a object that is used to hold table rows. 方法主要由扩展 控件功能的控件开发人员使用。The method is primarily of interest to control developers extending the functionality of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Height { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件的高度。

span.span: Gets or sets the height of the control.
The height of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性控制的高度控件。Use the property to control the height of the control. 通常将高度指定以像素为单位。The height is normally specified in pixels. 但是，你还可以通过将百分号 （%） 追加到值指定浏览器窗口高度的百分比。However, you can also specify a percentage of the browser window height by appending a percent sign (%) to the value. 例如，值`100%`指示作为浏览器窗口的完整高度的表的高度。For example, the value `100%` indicates a height for the table that is the full height of the browser window. 表自动扩展和收缩在用户更改窗口大小。The table automatically expands and contracts as the user changes the window size. > [!NOTE] > 如果指定一个值，小于需要显示的内容控件，此属性将被忽略。If you specify a value that is smaller than is required to display the contents of the control, this property is ignored. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以编程方式控制的高度控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically control the height of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableAppearance/CS/htmltablebgcolorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableAppearance/VB/htmltablebgcolorvb.aspx#1)]

This property is not supported for this control.

span.span: The content between the opening and closing tags of the control.

exception.span: 尝试读取此属性的值或向其分配值。

span.span: An attempt was made to read from or assign a value to this property.

This property is not supported for this control.

value.span: 控件的开始标记和结束标记之间的内容。

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override void RenderChildren (System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void RenderChildren(class System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer) cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Sub RenderChildren (writer As HtmlTextWriter)

span.span: The that receives the rendered content.

summary.span: 将 控件的子控件呈现给指定的 对象。

span.span: Renders the control's child controls to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供附加格式设置之前和之后调用基类的方法。The method provides additional formatting before and after calling the base class's method. 附加的格式设置使的呈现的 HTML控件更轻松地插入换行符和缩进在呈现之前读取控件的子控件。The additional formatting makes the rendered HTML of the control easier to read by inserting a line return and indenting before rendering the control's child controls. 主要由控件开发人员扩展功能的使用方法控件。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法中的自定义的服务器控件，以便新的表行追加到控件。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that a new table row is appended to the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlTableRenderChildren#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTableRenderChildren/CS/custom_htmltable_renderchildrencs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlTableRenderChildren#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTableRenderChildren/VB/custom_htmltable_renderchildrenvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlTableRenderChildren#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTableRenderChildren/CS/custom_htmltable_renderchildren.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlTableRenderChildren#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTableRenderChildren/VB/custom_htmltable_renderchildren.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void RenderEndTag(class System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub RenderEndTag (writer As HtmlTextWriter)

span.span: The that receives the rendered content.

summary.span: 呈现 控件的结束标记。

span.span: Renders the control's end tag.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 方法提供调用基类的之后附加格式设置方法。The method provides additional formatting after calling the base class's method. 附加的格式设置使的呈现的 HTML关闭之后返回控件更易读的方法是插入行``标记。The additional formatting makes the rendered HTML of the control easier to read by inserting a line return after the closing `
` tag.主要由控件开发人员扩展功能的使用方法控件。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法，以便它始终将结束标记和新行在自定义服务器控件。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method so that it always writes an end tag and a new line in a custom server control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlTableRenderEndTag#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTableRenderEndTag/CS/custom_htmltable_renderendtagcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlTableRenderEndTag#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTableRenderEndTag/VB/custom_htmltable_renderendtagvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlTableRenderEndTag#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTableRenderEndTag/CS/custom_htmltable_renderendtag.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlTableRenderEndTag#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTableRenderEndTag/VB/custom_htmltable_renderendtag.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Rows As HtmlTableRowCollection

summary.span: 获取包含 控件中的所有行的 集合。

span.span: Gets an collection that contains all the rows in the control.

value.span: ，它包含 控件中的所有行。

span.span: An that contains all the rows in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用集合以编程方式访问中的行控件。Use the collection to programmatically access the rows in the control. 你可以以编程方式添加行，删除行，或将行插入到集合。You can programmatically add rows to, remove rows from, or insert rows into the collection. > [!NOTE] > 如果有任何``元素中列出控制，空返回对象。If there are no `` elements listed in the control, an empty object is returned. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用要以编程方式添加到行集合控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the collection to programmatically add a row to the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTable#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTable/CS/htmltablecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTable#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTable/VB/htmltablevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Width { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件的宽度。

span.span: Gets or sets the width of the control.
The width of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性控制的宽度控件。Use the property to control the width of the control. 通常以像素为单位指定宽度。The width is normally specified in pixels. 但是，你还可以通过将百分号 （%） 追加到值指定浏览器窗口宽度的百分比。However, you can also specify a percentage of the browser window width by appending a percent sign (%) to the value. 例如，值`100%`指示的表的整个宽度的浏览器窗口的宽度。For example, the value `100%` indicates a width for the table that is the full width of the browser window. 表自动扩展和收缩在用户更改窗口大小。The table automatically expands and contracts as the user changes the window size. > [!NOTE] > 如果指定一个值，小于需要显示的内容控件，此属性将被忽略。If you specify a value that is smaller than is required to display the contents of the control, this property is ignored. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以编程方式控制的宽度控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically control the width of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableAppearance/CS/htmltablebgcolorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableAppearance/VB/htmltablebgcolorvb.aspx#1)]
